title: I was sexually harassed by music executives as a teenager - Yemi Alade
description: Nigerian singer Yemi Alade has opened up about the challenges she faced during her early years as a young, struggling female artiste. The Johnny crooner
content:
Nigerian singer Yemi Alade has opened up about the challenges she faced during her early years as a young, struggling female artiste.
The Johnny crooner revealed that sexual harassment was the major challenge she confronted, recalling how music execu... [1534 chars]
